HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Next business day for in-stock items ordered before 13:00.

express_delivery.delivery_time: Next business day for orders before 13:00.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Free shipping does not apply to bulky items.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery, Parcel Shop (Zásilkovna), and In-store pickup are available.
PROVIDERS: GLS, DPD, PPL, WE|DO, and Zásilkovna.
PRICING: Home delivery costs 119 Kč, Zásilkovna pickup points cost 89 Kč. In-store pickup is free. Free shipping is offered on orders over 2500 Kč, but this does not apply to bulky items.
RESTRICTIONS: Bulky items incur a fixed shipping charge of 299 Kč.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Very fast dispatch, with orders of in-stock items placed before 13:00 being delivered the next business day. Three physical pickup locations are available (Bohumín, Ostrava, Havířov). COD is available for a 39 Kč fee.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly on a dedicated page. It is comprehensive, covering costs, providers, delivery speed, and exceptions for bulky goods. The information is easy to understand.
